pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows XP 7, .Net framework 3.5
  • Processor: Hyperthreaded Intel CPU, AMD Athlon 64 CPU
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 30 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Soundblaster compatible soundcard
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 or Windows 11, .Net framework 3.5
  • Processor: Multi-core CPU (Intel Core i5 or i7, AMD Phenom II QUAD X4)
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 50 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Soundblaster compatible soundcard

short_description: Pattaya 2, the 2nd version of the famous Thai off-road track! A new challenging lay-out to test your r/c offroad racing skills!
